name: One Arrow
description:
Only One Arrow is a twin stick archery game where players must shoot ghosts while dodging their attacks. The player only has one arrow and must pick it up after firing.

Controls

Controller Only

  • Right Analog Stick - Movement
  • Left Analog Stick - Aim
  • Right Trigger - When holding the trigger character draws the bow and stops moving. 
  • Left Trigger - Character Dodges.
